title: "Mediterranean diet may prevent cognitive issues for people with MS"
excerpt: "The finding suggests that the diet – which features fresh produce, seafood, nuts, olive oil and minimal red meat and sugar – may prevent or even treat cognitive symptoms related to the condition."
